Name: 1-in-4 Selectable W-Engine
Desc: Upon use, you can select a W-Engine from the following: The Vault, Demara Battery Mark II, Starlight Engine Replica or Housekeeper.
Desc2: The best-selling W-Engine gift box in the city. Among the many reviews, there are even some familiar IDs. If you discuss their taste in choosing W-Engine with these friends... you might discover some shared interests!
